In-memory testing using ASP.NET Core
LinkList.Description: For integration tests, Microsoft provides a TestServer class in Microsoft.AspNetCore.TestHost which allows you to communicate from the test client to your ASP.NET application. Your application is loaded into the current process and the TestServer class allows you to bypass the network HTTP layer and write tests directly to ASP.NET Core request pipeline.
